name: Pony Monster Girls Dress Up: High School Fashions Dressing Style Maker Version
name_original: Pony Monster Girls Dress Up: High School Fashions Dressing Style Maker Version
description:
Free Dress Up Games is a fun game where you have to dress up Girls Models different dress. Change all kinds of shirts, dresses, skirts, boots, and bags! Then you can even dazzle things up with jewelry! It's a total fashion makeover!

It's like your own dress where you can create the styles that make the other girls! Now you can design your own 'Monster Fashions' like never before!
